summary.span: 針對表示工作流程畫布的設計工具檢視，提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 控制項。

span.span: Provides Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) controls for the designer view that represents the workflow canvas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 與 介面，以提供具名 XAML 項目，以及將事件處理常式附加至這些項目的支援。Implements the and interfaces to provide support for named XAML elements and for attaching event handlers to them.

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 PreviewMouseWheel 事件。

span.span: Raises the PreviewMouseWheel event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時，叫用此項目。This event is invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. 覆寫這個方法可以為這個事件加入類別處理。Override this method to add class handling for this event. 如果在處理此事件時按下 CTRL 鍵，就會根據滑鼠滾輪的移動，放大或縮小檢視。If the CTRL key is pressed when this event is processed, the view is zoomed in or out, based on the movement of the mouse wheel.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnReferenceUpdated (System.Reflection.AssemblyName updatedReference, bool isAdded);
.method public hidebysig instance void OnReferenceUpdated(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName updatedReference, bool isAdded) cil managed
Public Sub OnReferenceUpdated (updatedReference As AssemblyName, isAdded As Boolean)

param.name: updatedReference
param.span: 已加入或移除的參考組件。

span.span: The referenced assembly that is added or removed.

param.name: isAdded
param.span: 如果已加入組件參考，則為 ；如果已移除組件參考，則為 。

span.span: if the assembly reference is added; if the assembly reference is removed.

summary.span: 根據加入或移除指定的參考組件，重新整理已匯入之命名空間的清單。

span.span: Refreshes the list of imported namespaces based on whether the specified referenced assembly is added or removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已加入參考組件，就會將組件中找到之型別的命名空間加入至已匯入之命名空間的清單。If the referenced assembly is added, the namespaces of the types found in the assembly are added to the list of imported namespaces. 如果已移除參考組件，就會將組件中找到之型別的命名空間從已匯入之命名空間的清單移除。If the referenced assembly is removed, the namespaces of the types found in the assembly are removed from the list of imported namespaces.

summary.span: 按一下 [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] 介面上的 [] 按鈕會起始這個動作。

span.span: Clicking the button on the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] surface initiates this action.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何將這個屬性繫結至按鈕。The following code sample demonstrates how to bind this property to a button. ```xaml ``` 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 C# 叫用這個屬性。The following code sample demonstrates how invoke this property in C#. ```csharp DesignerView dView = des.Context.Services.GetService(); ((RoutedCommand)DesignerView.ToggleArgumentDesignerCommand).Execute(null, dView); ```
